name: ABDUCTED (itch)
description:
Description:

You have woken in a strange place and have no idea how you got there.  Your goal is to find a way out but don't get cough or else you may never see the light of day again.

Features:

  1. Creepy Environment
  2. Interactive Objects
  3. Puzzle solving
  4. Hiding Mechanics
  5. Jump Scares

*There is currently only one escape choice (front door) but I am working on new choices.*
